YOU GUYS, I DON'T KNOW--

LISTEN, THAT CHANTING WAS JUST

WELCOME TO THE LATE SHOW, I'M

I DON'T KNOW IF YOU GUYS HAVE
NOTICED BUT ONE OF THE THINGS I

LIKE TO DO AT THE BEGINNING OF

AND IT'S BECOME A HABIT.
AND FUN FACT.

I AM NOT THE ONLY ONE IN THE

VLADIMIR PUTIN.
AND THIS IS ABSOLUTELY TRUE.

HIS WALK IS SO DISTINCTIVE, THAT
RECENTLY A TEAM OF NEUROLOGISTS

PUBLISHED AN ARTICLE ABOUT IT,
CHECK OUTPUTIN'S WALK.
YOU SEE, HERE HE IS WALKING.

HE SWINGS HIS LEFT ARM BUT HIS
RIGHT ARM ALWAYS STAYS BY HIS
SIDE.

(LAUGHTER)
AND THEY THINK IT'S BECAUSE OF
HIS KGB TRAINING, OKAY.

THEY'RE CALLING PUTIN'S WALK A
GUNSLINGER'S GAIT BECAUSE HIS

RIGHT HAND IS ALWAYS IN POSITION
TO PULL A GUN FROM HIS POCKET,
OKAY.
LIKE THIS.
HE JUST WALKS LIKE THIS.
WITH ONE ARM BY HIS SIDE, LOOK.

(LAUGHTER)
THIS IS NO TRAINING, I CAN DO
THIS.
NO TRAINING AT ALL.

I COULD HAVE BEEN IN THE KGB
EASY.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
HERE'S THE DEAL, IF PUTIN HAS

GOT A TOUGH WALK, THAT MEANS
PRESIDENT OBAMA NEEDS AN EVEN
YOU HAVE ITER GUY WALK.

IF HE DOESN'T FIND SOMETHING TO
DO WITH HIS LIMBS, WE'RE GOING

TO LITERALLY LOSE THE ARM'S
RACE.

(APPLAUSE)

(APPLAUSE)
THAT JOKE COURTESY OF LITTLE

NOW FIRST, OBVIOUSLY, OBVIOUSLY

DOWN, OKAY, INDICATING YOU'VE

BY THE GUN IN YOUR ANKLE HOLSTER

IT WILL THROW HIM OFF.

THIS WALK, THIS WALK GIVES YOU

NO ONE CAN COME TO YOU, NO ONE

THIS ONE, THEY'LL THINK YOU'RE A

THEY'LL THINK YOU ARE A CRAB.

AND WE'VE GOT A GREAT SHOW FOR

NOW I'M SURE, I'M SURE SOME
